pr_title: fix: Do not fail on rule engine call  and just log an exception

timeline.message: fix: Do not fail on rule engine call  and just log an exception

timeline.bodyText: Just a suggestion. Instead of hiding the original exception, wouldn't it be better to use log.warn( "message", ex);
timeline.author: zubaira

replies.bodyText:
Of course. Just got lost in the commit.
Thanks
replies.author: enricocolasante

timeline.author: enricocolasante
luciano-fiandesio
luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure about the message: I would not reference the payload, since we are catching a generic exception. Perhaps something along the line: "An error occured during an Program RUle engine call for enrollment ..... Please check the response payload for additional information"
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.message: Fix tests and code review comments
